text:
This is my second time visiting L'éclair Pâtisserie, and I’m still as impressed as I was the first time! The high tea set is absolutely delightful, with a wonderful selection of teas and delicious treats. The eclairs that come with the set are a standout—perfectly balanced and not overly sweet, which is a relief since sometimes desserts can feel overwhelming.

The ambiance is always cozy and inviting, making it the perfect spot for a relaxing afternoon. Every visit has been consistently enjoyable, and I can't wait to return! Highly recommend for anyone looking for a top-notch high tea experience.

The eclairs were heavenly. The dark chocolate had a lovely rich chocolate cream topped with three chocolate streusels (choc balls) which gave it a nice crunch. The salter caramel was delightfully sweet and salty, very well balanced flavor. A lovely afternoon tea pitstop. I did notice their pasta lunch menu which looked and smelled delicious so will be back for the next round of reviews.
Nice and quiet place. Ambience is good. Main dishes are surprisingly yummy and reasonably priced. Eclair is super good, though abit ex!!! Definitely will come back again!

🌸✨ A Tranquil Afternoon at L'Eclair Café ☕🍰

Looking for a relaxing afternoon tea spot? I stumbled upon this cozy hidden gem, and wow, what a lovely experience! 🥰

From the moment I stepped in, I felt the calm and peaceful ambiance—soft music playing, warm lighting, and a beautifully decorated space.

Perfect for a chill and slow afternoon. 💆‍♀️🌿

🍵 The afternoon tea Set – Lexperience Delight 🍰

I ordered the Lexperience afternoon tea Set, and OMG, it was absolutely worth it! 😍

Only $48 for 2 people, and trust me, it’s more than enough! Super filling and beautifully presented, like a piece of art. 🎨💖

✔️ 3 selection of delicate eclairs—so adorable and colorful! 😍

Each bite was a perfect balance of sweetness and creaminess. 🍫🍓

✔️ Flaky, buttery pastries that simply melt in your mouth! 🥐✨

✔️ Freshly baked scones, served with blueberry jam—pure perfection! 🥰🍯

💁‍♂️ Service & Atmosphere 🌿

The staff are super friendly and welcoming! 🥰 However, I felt that the Indian server could have explained the pastries a little better—it would have made the experience even more special. But overall, service was warm and attentive. 🤗

The ambiance is top-notch—quiet, relaxed, and perfect for a cozy date, a catch-up session with friends, or even some peaceful me-time. 💕📖

🌟 Final Thoughts – Would I Come Back?

YES, 100%! 😍 If you’re looking for a chill, aesthetic, and worth-it high tea experience, this is THE place to be. 💖

Perfect for those who appreciate good food, good vibes, and a peaceful afternoon. ☕✨

🔹 Price: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (Super worth it for the quality & portion!)
🔹 Ambiance: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (Cozy, elegant, and relaxing)
🔹 Service: ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ (Great, but could improve on explanations)
🔹 Taste: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (Delicate, delicious & satisfying)

📍 Highly recommend for:
✔️ Afternoon tea lovers 🍵✨
✔️ Cozy, chill vibes seekers 🌿
✔️ Couples, friends & solo relaxation time 🥰

Will definitely be back! Maybe next time, I’ll try more pastries too! 😆💕

#AfternoonTeaLover ☕ #ChillVibesOnly 🌸 #TeaTimeHappiness 🍰 #CozyCaféVibes 🥐 #SweetToothHeaven 😍 #RelaxAndUnwind 💆‍♀️ #WorthEveryPenny 💖

Very pretty looking eclairs, good as gifts. But a bit pricey (probably because of the presentation).

Taste wise, have a decent variety of flavours.

They also sell tiramisu and other hot meals if you arent just looking for desserts.

Each eclair is 9 dollars
